`inlin\`e code` (obviously).

This is `inlin\e code` (obviously).

 `inline code`

 `inlin\e code`

xyz \`const myCode = "isGreat"\`. This will be rendered as follows: `const myCode = "isGreat"`.
Here is a code fence:

```js
Some code
\`jdjdj\`
blah blah
```
